name: The Legend of Block
description:
Use your magician powers to move blocks and pave your way through! 

There is a treasure waiting at the end!

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD: Move character

Mouse (click and move): Move green blocks

This is a Ludum Dare 41 entry, done in less than 48h (actually much less :D) so please forgive the lack of stages! Enjoy it!
